div.p: Distribution of predicted standard redox potentials (pH = 7) for a set of ∼315 000 non-natural redox reactions. Predicted potentials were obtained by running semiempirical quantum chemical calculations ( Methods) and correcting for systematic errors using Gaussian process regression. The green distribution shows the E′ m(pH = 7) values for 53 095 reductions of carbonyls to amines. The blue distribution shows the E′ m(pH = 7) values for 261 903 reductions of carbonyls to alcohols.
